name: Endust For Electronics; Screen & Surface Cleaning Wipes, For TV, Phone, Computer Monitor, Laptop, Tablet, Pre-Moistened, Alcohol and Ammonia Free, 70 Count, 6 Pack (11506P6)
short_description: SCREEN & ELECTRONICS CLEANER: Endust screen wipes for electronics instantly removes dirt, dust, and fingerprints from your screen for a clear and clean surface without leaving residue or streaks. Gets rid of debris, helps reduce dust build up and skin oil smudges for distraction free vision.

MULTIPURPOSE: Excellent for cleaning TVs, laptops & computers, tablets, keyboards & mice, video game consoles, streaming devices, cameras, phones, DVDs & CDs, headphones & speakers, computer or laptop monitors, printers & copiers, remote controls, and more.

EASY TO USE WIPES: A one step cleaning solution. These single use, pre-moistened disposable wipes are easy to use and conveniently dispense one at a time from the dispensing cap. Keep cap closed to prevent moisture loss.

QUICK DRY: Wipe screen, surface or tablet with the wipe and let it air dry or wipe with a microfiber cloth to speed up dry time. Leaves surfaces clean and streak free without causing damage or scratches.

NON-TOXIC FORMULA: Safe to use formula with non-toxic, alcohol and amonia free ingredients. Great to keep at home, at the office, or on the go. Made in the USA. Great for use as electronic wipes, laptop cleaner, TV screen cleaner, phone cleaner or any electronic cleaner.
COMPARE & SAVE: Compare the our product quantity and price with our competitors.
product_description: Clean and protect your valuable electronic screens and devices, keeping them in new condition with Endust For Electronics Screen and Electronics Cleaning Wipes. These premoistened and streak free antistatic wipes will rid your electronic screens from dust, dirt, and fingerprints. Specially formulated to safely clean your LCD and Plasma Screens, Tablets, Smartphones and Remote Controls. The debris will cling to the fabric on the wipe, rather than leaving the debris on your device, resulting in a flawless, streak free surface. Each 7” x 5” wipe removes fingerprints, reduces dust buildup and cleans smudges, leaving a mirror like shine. A soft, non-abrasive alcohol and ammonia free formula is specially formulated to safely clean screens and electronic surfaces. Our Six Container Multi Pack is ideal for Schools, Offices, Institutions or any environment with a large number of electronic surfaces that need to be cleaned and protected. Each container contains 70 count wipes designed to restore and protect your electronic devices. Directions for Use: For best results, use one wipe on smaller devices such as Tablets, Smartphones, and Remote Controls. For these smaller devices allow the wipe to dry slightly and wipe until the wipe is dry. For larger surfaces, such as TV Screens and Monitors, more than one wipe may be necessary. For all devices, always consult your owner’s manual before use. Wipe Screen/Surface/Tablet Screen with wipe. Let air dry or use a microfiber towel to speed up drying. Dispose of wipe into receptacle in accordance with your local recycling and disposal regulations. Never Flush Wipe. To Open Container: Flip Open Dispensing Cap. Locate end of first wipe in the center of the roll. Pull the first wipe through large opening in lid and pull into smaller opening. Dispense wipes by pulling wipe upward and slightly forward. Close dispensing cap tightly after use. When properly sealed, lid will snap shut to prevent moisture loss. Precaution: To prevent damage and reduce streaks make sure your device is off and fully cooled down prior to cleaning. Avoid eye contact. Not intended for use on skin. Wash hand thoroughly after handling. Keep out of reach of children and pets. Safely Cleans: TV’s Cameras Cell Phones DVD’s & CD’s Headphones and Speakers Home Theater & Audio Monitors Printers & Copiers Remote Controls

product_description: Wondering how to clean your phone screen or flat screen TV? Windex Electronics Wipes are an effective and safe screen cleaner you can trust on even your most valuable devices. The advanced formula in these cleaning wipes gently removes smudges, fingerprints and dust without damaging your screens or leaving any visible residue behind. Perfect for that traveling tablet or that shiny new phone, use these screen wipes for electronics to clean smartphones, tablets, e-readers, laptops, cameras, televisions and more. Carry the pouch in your purse, backpack, briefcase or laptop bag so you can brighten your screen at any time. All you have to do is peel back the seal on the pouch, remove a wipe and reseal the pouch to preserve moisture. Wipe any surface you want to clean and discard the wipe once it gets dirty or dries out. Give Life a Sparkle with Windex!
